verify.name: Verify the use of fc command with different options
verify.hint:
Make sure you have used the fc command with the following options:
- -e to specify the nano editor
- -n -l to list the command history without line numbers
- <start> <end> to edit a range of commands
- -s to reexecute the edited command directly
